data.quote: Ironically, when I was in Dubai with the BBC 'Good Food Show,' even though it's an urban area, when you see the vast panorama from the top of the Burj Khalifa, it feels remote, as if it's just sprung up out of the desert. I like Dubai. I didn't think I would, but the food and the people were great.
data.author: Paul Hollywood

data.quote: There is really no room in any healthy diet for trans fat, artificial sweeteners, and artificial colors in food.
data.author: Jillian Michaels

data.quote: I am still not a fussy eater, although I do enjoy good food.
data.author: Yves Chauvin

data.quote: Hey, I used to eat at McDonald's: I liked the taste of the food, especially the French fries.
data.author: Eric Schlosser

data.quote: I do not know that any writer has supposed that on this earth man will ultimately be able to live without food.
data.author: Thomas Malthus

data.quote: My quest these days is to find my long lost inner child, but I'm afraid if I do, I'll end up with food in my hair and way too in love with the cats.
data.author: Kenny Loggins

data.quote: I eat soup noodles for comfort. In fact, noodles of any kind. It's a food that is very easy to eat; it's very soothing and comfortable, too. If I could choose any, I'd say buckwheat was my favourite: it has a very good flavour and is healthy, too.
data.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

data.quote: More die in the United States of too much food than of too little.
data.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

data.quote: I learned very early that our health is always impaired by some excess either of food or abstinence, and I never had any physician except myself.
data.author: Giacomo Casanova

data.quote: The world produces enough food for everyone. Why are one billion people going hungry?
data.author: Orlando Bloom

data.quote: I'm kind of a homebody. I like to sit at home and watch movies and eat good food.
data.author: Emilie de Ravin

data.quote: Sorry, I don't eat any fast food. I believe in eating healthy organic foods for a better lifestyle.
data.author: Keegan Allen

data.quote: A house is no home unless it contain food and fire for the mind as well as for the body.
data.author: Margaret Fuller

data.quote: I don't want food that comes from animals that are caged up and fed antibiotics. I am really suspicious of that kind of production of meat and poultry.
data.author: Alice Waters

data.quote: Children want to mimic adults. They notice when you choose to prepare fresh vegetables over calling in another pizza pie for dinner. They will see that food made with love and care outweighs going through the drive-through window.
data.author: Marcus Samuelsson

data.quote: True economy consists in always making the income exceed the out-go. Wear the old clothes a little longer if necessary; dispense with the new pair of gloves; mend the old dress: live on plainer food if need be; so that, under all circumstances, unless some unforeseen accident occurs, there will be a margin in favor of the income.
data.author: P. T. Barnum

data.quote: I am not complaining; I had a beautiful childhood - we didn't have a lot of money, but there was always food on the table, and my parents saved money so that in the holidays we would all get in the car and drive to the mountains. I have amazing parents.

data.quote: Ultimately, the perfect meal is when those things come together - circumstance, the food, ambiance, and you're with the person that you want to be with.
data.author: Grant Achatz

data.quote: Innovations that are guided by smallholder farmers, adapted to local circumstances, and sustainable for the economy and environment will be necessary to ensure food security in the future.
data.author: Bill Gates

data.quote: The idea behind fast food is great - people want convenience.
data.author: Kimbal Musk

data.quote: I have no taste for corruptible food nor for the pleasures of this life. I desire the Bread of God, which is the Flesh of Jesus Christ, who was of the seed of David, and for drink I desire His Blood, which is love incorruptible.
data.author: Ignatius of Antioch

data.quote: I love Thanksgiving. In Canada, we don't really have a lot of history with Thanksgiving, and it's a holiday devoted to food, and that warms the cockles of my being.

data.quote: I don't eat fast food often, but I love tacos. I could write prophetically about how perfect the taco is.
data.author: Ken Baumann

data.quote: Tokyo would probably be the foreign city if I had to eat one city's food for the rest of my life, every day. It would have to be Tokyo, and I think the majority of chefs you ask that question would answer the same way.

data.quote: Yom Kippur, the Day of Atonement, is the holy of holies of Jewish time. It is that rarest of phenomena, a Jewish festival without food. Instead it is a day of fasting and prayer, introspection and self-judgment when, collectively and repeatedly, we confess our sins and pray to be written into God's Book of Life.
data.author: Jonathan Sacks

data.quote: I love the food in Thailand because of the exotic spices they use. Their style of cooking is unique to their culture and always amazing.
data.author: Venus Williams

data.quote: The agony of my feelings allowed me no respite no incident occurred from which my rage and misery could not extract its food.
data.author: Mary Shelley

data.quote: It seems strange that bears, so fond of all sorts of flesh, running the risks of guns and fires and poison, should never attack men except in defense of their young. How easily and safely a bear could pick us up as we lie asleep! Only wolves and tigers seem to have learned to hunt man for food, and perhaps sharks and crocodiles.
data.author: John Muir

data.quote: There are certain comforts of living here in Dubai, the comforts of so many mosques and so much good food... It's just that much more secure. And may God keep it safe.
data.author: Cat Stevens

data.quote: Statistics show that of those who contract the habit of eating, very few survive.
data.author: George Bernard Shaw

data.quote: Food simply isn't important to me.
data.author: Alice Paul

data.quote: Every meal should end with something sweet. Maybe it's jelly on toast at breakfast, or a small piece of chocolate at dinner - but it always helps my brain bring a close to the meal.

data.quote: I'm a very, very healthy eater. I eat lots of fish, lots of vegetables, lots of fruit. I don't eat junk food.

data.quote: Unlike the primate hand, the elephant's grasping organ is also its nose. Elephants use their trunks not only to reach food but also to sniff and touch it. With their unparalleled sense of smell, the animals know exactly what they are going for. Vision is secondary.

data.quote: I follow my own advice: eat less, move more, eat lots of fruits, vegetables, and grains, and don't eat too much junk food. It leaves plenty of flexibility for eating an occasional junk food.

data.quote: You can't have a healthy civilization without healthy soil. You can't have junk food and have healthy people.

data.quote: I love England, especially the food. There's nothing I like more than a lovely bowl of pasta.
data.author: Naomi Campbell

data.quote: Eating a high-nutrient diet actually makes you more satisfied with less food, and actually gives the ability to enjoy food more without overeating.

data.quote: Like the practice of breath control, meditation on the forms of God, repetition of mantras, food restrictions, etc., are but aids for rendering the mind quiescent.

data.quote: I love to talk about cooking and recipes, but I love as much talking about how food and cooking can change the world.

data.quote: For me, the good food starts with good product.
data.author: Jean-Georges Vongerichten

data.quote: People are generally proud of their food. A willingness to eat and drink with people without fear and prejudice... they open up to you in ways that somebody visiting who is driven by a story may not get.

data.quote: Humans love sex, we need sex, it's how we connect, it reminds us we're alive, it's the third most basic human need, after food and good movie popcorn.

data.quote: We may find in the long run that tinned food is a deadlier weapon than the machine-gun.

data.quote: Facts are to the mind what food is to the body.

data.quote: To me, food is as much about the moment, the occasion, the location and the company as it is about the taste.
data.author: Heston Blumenthal

data.author: Yehuda Berg

data.quote: The experience of being cared for is profound, and it nourishes the soul as much as the food does the body.
data.author: Mariska Hargitay

data.quote: My favorite food from my homeland is Guinness. My second choice in Guinness. My third choice - would have to be Guinness.
data.author: Peter O'Toole

data.quote: The 1 to 2 billion poorest in the world, who don't have food for the day, suffer from the worst disease: globalization deficiency. The way globalization is occurring could be much better, but the worst thing is not being part of it. For those people, we need to support good civil societies and governments.
data.author: Hans Rosling

data.quote: 'The Others' books take place in an alternate Earth where the Earth natives have been the dominant predators throughout the world's history, and humans are nowhere near the top of the food chain. But humans are clever and resilient, if not always wise, and have made some bargains with the Others in order to survive.
data.author: Anne Bishop

data.quote: Fast food chains spend a large amount of marketing to get the attention of children. People form their eating habits as children so they try to nurture clients as youngsters.
data.author: Eric Schlosser

data.quote: One man's trash is another man's treasure, and the by-product from one food can be perfect for making another.
data.author: Yotam Ottolenghi

data.quote: If the people use the wealth bestowed on them by God for themselves alone or for treasuring it, it is like a corpse. But if they decide to share it with others, it becomes sacred food.
data.author: Guru Nanak

data.quote: In a drama of the highest order there is little food for censure or hatred it teaches rather self-knowledge and self-respect.
data.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

data.quote: You know you poor when you eatin' breakfast food late. You fryin' toast? At nine o'clock at night? With bacon? You're broke.
data.author: Bernie Mac

data.quote: The easiest diet is, you know, eat vegetables, eat fresh food. Just a really sensible healthy diet like you read about all the time.

data.quote: It was interesting to think that the very first liquid ever poured on the Moon, and the first food eaten there, were communion elements.

data.quote: I've been on a team that won the world championship of barbecue. But barbecue's interesting, because it's one of these cult foods like chili, or bouillabaisse. data.author: Nathan Myhrvold

data.quote: Scotch beef, salmon and shellfish are recognised the world over for their excellence and Scottish provenance. People recognise the Scottish brand. They associate the country with quality food and drink, and clearly other Scottish sectors, such as dairy, can benefit from that, too.
data.author: Nicola Sturgeon

data.quote: I am not a great cook, I am not a great artist, but I love art, and I love food, so I am the perfect traveller.

data.author: David O. Russell

data.quote: We've gotten so far away from our food source. It's been hijacked from us. But if you get soil, plant something in it and water it, you can feed yourself. It's that simple.
data.author: Ron Finley

data.quote: I'm very proud of the Rome episode of 'No Reservations' because it violated all the conventional wisdom about making television. You're never, ever supposed to do a food or travel show in black and white.

data.quote: When I feel stressed, I turn to food for comfort, but I don't like to diet and I'm not good at it.

data.quote: One way to find food for thought is to use the fork in the road, the bifurcation that marks the place of emergence in which a new line of development begins to branch off.

data.quote: I always made my food congenial to my constitution, and my health was always excellent.

data.quote: I like putting my money into things like food and shelter. I'm probably a bad example of an investor.

data.author: John Paul DeJoria

data.quote: I live a healthy lifestyle and I crave healthy food. I love porridge - I have bizarre cravings for it. I love it with brown sugar and bananas, and I'm a huge fan of cinnamon - I put cinnamon on everything. I also have a sweet tooth and I don't like to deprive myself. I think everything in moderation is the key.
data.author: Jessica Lowndes

data.quote: The traditional family table is round. No corners. No sides. No head. No tail. Everything is smooth. The food is in the center, and each family member reaches over the same distance. data.quote: Chefs are at the end of a long chain of individuals who work hard to feed people. Farmers, beekeepers, bakers, scientists, fishermen, grocers, we are all part of that chain, all food people, all dedicated to feeding the world.

data.quote: If I have one addiction in life, it's probably food.

data.quote: Growing up the way I grew up, food was scarce. So when you had an opportunity to eat, you ate. When I graduated from high school and went to college, I weighed 160 pounds. data.quote: I don't eat a lot of junk food anymore, but I sure remember it. I used to go through boxes of Little Debbies. I liked Star Crunch, and of course those oatmeal pies.

data.quote: Man seems to be the only animal whose food soils him, making necessary much washing and shield-like bibs and napkins. Moles living in the earth and eating slimy worms are yet as clean as seals or fishes, whose lives are one perpetual wash.

data.quote: I'd love for mental illness to be seen in the way that other horrible illnesses are. When people get cancer, very few parents will say, 'Oh I feel so bad for giving you so much unhealthy food over the years.'

data.quote: Poverty is relative, and the lack of food and of the necessities of life is not necessarily a hardship. Spiritual and social ostracism, the invasion of your privacy, are what constitute the pain of poverty.

data.quote: Families are struggling against a tide of junk information on junk food.

data.quote: I'm not a machine. I get really motivated, then I fall off the wagon and want to eat Chinese food and sit on my couch and gain five or 10 pounds!

data.quote: I think that any business that thinks that the transaction is 'you give me money and I give you food, next, you give me money and I give you food, next,' without understanding that people deeply want to feel restored is in danger.

data.quote: Our lives are not in the lap of the gods, but in the lap of our cooks.

data.quote: When I eat with my friends, it is a moment of real pleasure, when I really enjoy my life.

data.quote: I tried to bake a cake for my mother's birthday - it took me four hours. It was terrible, and I cried for three days.

data.quote: Many rock musicians are excellent cooks, I've found, and those that are prefer to eat their own cooking in the studio. I encourage this behavior as I also enjoy the benefits of fresh food.

data.quote: From the simple stringing together of lemon garlands for the goddess Durga, to dividing the prasadam or blessed foods for the children first, I came to associate food not only with feminity, but also with purity and divinity.

data.quote: Being a vegan is pretty easy these days, as almost every town and city has health food stores and vegetarian-friendly restaurants.
data.author: Moby

data.quote: I believe that you can, by taking some simple and inexpensive measures, lead a longer life and extend your years of well-being. My most important recommendation is that you take vitamins every day in optimum amounts to supplement the vitamins that you receive in your food.
data.author: Linus Pauling

data.quote: The biggest thing you can do is understand that every time you're going to the grocery store, you're voting with your dollars. Support your farmers' market. Support local food. Really learn to cook.
data.author: Alice Waters

data.quote: I cook a lot of Italian food. Bucatini Pomodoro is my best: it's a fat spaghetti with tomato, olive oil, and reminds me of getting married in Italy.

data.quote: I turned into a monk when my mother went to learn Buddhism in Burma. While she learnt at the monastery, I used to roam around with a begging bowl and ask for food.

data.quote: I genuinely enjoy the process of making colourful, delicious food. But I do allow myself an occasional piece of chocolate - today I had a pastry. If I fancy something, I'll have it.
data.author: Victoria Pendleton

data.quote: Species co-evolve with the other species they eat, and very often, a relationship of interdependence develops: I'll feed you if you spread around my genes. A gradual process of mutual adaptation transforms something like an apple or a squash into a nutritious and tasty food for a hungry animal.
data.author: Michael Pollan

data.quote: Mankind: A quality of life upgrade is available to each and every one of you. It should give you a quality of life upgrade, which means no drugs, no alcohol, no fast food - unless, of course, it's a mallard.
data.author: Ted Nugent

data.quote: Put your nose into the Bible everyday. It is your spiritual food. And then share it. Make a vow not to be a lukewarm Christian.
data.author: Kirk Cameron

data.quote: Each of us needs something - food, liquor, pot, whatever - to help us survive. Dracula needs blood.
data.author: Frank Langella

data.quote: If I agree to dispose of any part of our land to the white people I would feel guilty of taking food away from our children's mouths, and I do not wish to be that mean.
data.author: Sitting Bull

data.quote: At home I serve the kind of food I know the story behind.
data.author: Michael Pollan

data.quote: It is easier to have faith that God will support each House of Hospitality and Farming Commune and supply our needs in the way of food and money to pay bills, than it is to keep a strong, hearty, living faith in each individual around us - to see Christ in him.
data.author: Dorothy Day

data.quote: The highlight of my childhood was making my brother laugh so hard that food came out of his nose.
data.author: Garrison Keillor

data.quote: About 20 per cent of the population believe themselves to have a food allergy and only about five per cent actually do.
data.author: John Warner

data.quote: I don't need the fillers, additives, excessive amounts of sugars, fats, salts and other measures taken to taint the natural goodness of real food.
data.author: Mark Hyman

data.quote: I spent a college semester in a small town in Italy - and that is where I truly tasted food for the first time.
data.author: Alton Brown

data.quote: We the chefs have a responsibility to learn about the chemical makeup of food!
data.author: Joel Robuchon

data.quote: Now listen, the one thing about agriculture is we've lost our manufacturing, we've lost a great deal of jobs overseas, lots of our industry. The last thing in the world we need to do is lose the ability to produce our food.
data.author: John Boozman

data.quote: Doing things like playing music, something that's so natural and basic to human function, running around in nature, eating delicious food. These things are intrinsic in basic, primordial to human beings, so that's sort of a way to return to a blank canvas, allowing my true personality to return.
data.author: Ezra Miller

data.quote: I'm a little self-conscious about my body. I love to wear hoodies because you can get cozy and eat some food and your belly doesn't show!
data.author: Jared Padalecki

data.quote: Our livelihood is intimately tied to the food we eat, water we drink and places where we recreate. That's why we have to promote responsibility and conservation when it comes to our natural resources.
data.author: Mark Udall

data.quote: I understand human needs. I grew up where far too many people lived day to day without elemental needs like food and shelter.
data.author: Naveen Jain

data.quote: Basically I'm a female human being with brown hair, enjoy precision, reading the news, eating delicious food with my delicious friends and laughing at ridiculous things that don't translate while you are desperately trying to make them.
data.author: Tig Notaro

data.quote: The way I see it, love is an amusement park, and food its souvenir.
data.author: Stephanie Klein

data.quote: I'm all in favor of animal rights, but I'd like to see the food movement take a much stronger stand in defense of basic human rights. If you're a vegan or a vegetarian, you should care about the people who are picking your fruits and vegetables by hand.
data.author: Eric Schlosser

data.quote: As a diabetic, I'm a walking picnic. I have to eat measured amounts of food at certain times.
data.author: Elaine Stritch

data.quote: People in my neighborhood are so disconnected from the fresh food supply that kids don't know an eggplant from a sweet potato. We have to show them how to get grounded in the truest sense of the word.
data.author: Ron Finley

data.quote: Jiro Ono serves Edo-style traditional sushi, the same 20 or 30 pieces he's been making his whole life, and he's still unsatisfied with the quality and every day wakes up and trains to make the best. And that is as close to a religious experience in food as one is likely to get.
data.author: Anthony Bourdain

data.quote: Yoga is the most boring exercise. It's for people who are too lazy to get on the elliptical. Bikram, where they heat up the room to mimic India's climate, is especially stupid. People in India are not skinny because they're doing yoga in 105-degree rooms; they're skinny because there's no food.
data.author: Noureen DeWulf

data.quote: I love the food, the girls, the sky and everything that is Delhi. I have very fond memories of the Moolchand flyover.
data.author: Vir Das

data.quote: The food and drink that goes along with football is one of the best things: hamburgers, hotdogs, chips and dips. At the stadium I would probably get nachos, but when I'm at home we order pizza a lot.
data.author: Marisa Miller

data.quote: Pasta isn't just for Italian food anymore. Now there are tasty pasta recipes found in Asian cuisine, and it's emerging as a newfound love for vegans.
data.author: Marcus Samuelsson

data.quote: In Italy, food is an expression of love. It is how you show those around you that you care for them. Having a love for food means you also have a love for those you are preparing it for and for yourself.
data.author: Joe Bastianich

data.quote: Create a garden; bring children to farms for field trips. I think it's important that parents and teachers get together to do one or two things they can accomplish well - a teaching garden, connecting with farms nearby, weave food into the curriculum.
data.author: Alice Waters

data.quote: I came to all the realizations about sustainability and biodiversity because I fell in love with the way food tastes. That was it. And because I was looking for that taste I feel at the doorsteps of the organic, local, sustainable farmers, dairy people and fisherman.
data.author: Alice Waters

data.quote: Social Security is based on a principle. It's based on the principle that you care about other people. You care whether the widow across town, a disabled widow, is going to be able to have food to eat.
data.author: Noam Chomsky

data.quote: If you maintain a healthy diet, or at least are smart about your food choices, you'll still see the pounds come off.
data.author: Misty May-Treanor

data.quote: I'm from Canada, so Thanksgiving to me is just Thursday with more food. And I'm thankful for that.
data.author: Howie Mandel

data.quote: In the Seventies, my children played in the street, read politically incorrect stories, ate home-cooked food and occasional junk and, yes, were sometimes smacked.
data.author: Laurie Graham

data.quote: Food is about communal togetherness. Our family does sit at the table. I think it's a great tragedy if a family doesn't have a table, as there is such an atmosphere of good will and warmth when we have eight people sitting around it.
data.author: Jonathan Dimbleby

data.quote: Sure, I like ice cream, but when you keep a healthy lifestyle, it's: Do you prefer sweets and crappy food, or do you prefer to have a nice body? It depends on what you want more.
data.author: Tim Howard

data.quote: What I miss most about Mexico isn't the food or the customs it's my family and the way we'd all sit around chatting together.
data.author: Javier Hernandez

data.quote: Let's face it: my life tends to revolve around food, and I love feeding people.
data.author: Ruth Reichl

data.quote: Barbecue is the good old technique of people making a fire and putting some stuff over the top - I mean, look at the S'more: it's just got a stick. A lot of those goofy toys, it's people who are looking at things to do. I think if you focus on the food, at the most you need tongs or a spoon to flip something; that's about it.
data.author: Graham Elliot

data.quote: The eligibility for food stamps has widened and widened welfare has been widened - unemployment insurance and disability insurance. These are all incentives not to work.
data.author: Lawrence Kudlow

data.quote: I was one of the first six black kids to integrate a formerly all-white school. I remember being looked at all the time and people laughing at my hair. I was also very self-conscious about the food I had for lunch. I had egg sandwiches, and the other mothers gave kids fancy stuff like bologna and Marmite. It took about a year to settle in.
data.author: Petina Gappah
